heroSubTitle: Easy to use one-time embed. Set it once and forget it.
heroImageAlt: VidLive widget example with previous video carousel.
introTitle: Live stream on your website with Facebook Live.
introSubTitle: Do you live stream from Facebook?  Would you like be able to auto-embed Facebook Live on your website? Well, you’ve come to the right place!

introFeatureList.title: Live on your website
introFeatureList.description: With VidLive, you can auto-embed Facebook Live directly on your website. Get started right away!

introFeatureList.title: One Time Embed
introFeatureList.description: No more wasting time updating embed codes every time you want to go live. Embed once and stream live every time.

introFeatureList.title: Last Live Placeholder
introFeatureList.description: Show your previous video when you are not live. Always have your previous video ready to play on your website.

introFeatureList.title: Placeholder Image
introFeatureList.description: Want to add your own custom image placeholder when you are not live on Facebook? No problem, you can do that.

introFeatureList.title: Automatic Start
introFeatureList.description: With VidLive, There is no page refresh required, your live stream starts automatically in less than 5 seconds after you go live.

introFeatureList.title: Distraction Free
introFeatureList.description: There are a lot of distractions on Facebook. Keep your audience focused on your website and Facebook Live video.

howToTitle: How to embed Facebook Live on your website:
howToSubTitle: Start live streaming Facebook Live on your website in 3 easy steps

hoToSteps.title: 1. Connect
hoToSteps.description: Use your Facebook account to securely connect your Facebook Page with VidLive.

hoToSteps.title: 2. Embed
hoToSteps.description: Simply add your one time embed code to the webpage you want to stream live to. Works with virtually any website or CMS.

hoToSteps.title: 3. Go Live
hoToSteps.description: Go Live from your Facebook Page... watch your Facebook live video stream automatically on your webpage.

whyTitle: Why embed Facebook Live on your website?

whyFeatureList.title: Reach more website visitors
whyFeatureList.description: 30% of your visitors may not have Facebook. Make it easy for them to view Facebook live streams on your website.

whyFeatureList.title: It’s easy
whyFeatureList.description: With VidLive, it’s so easy to embed live services on your website. Embed your widget code just once and you are done.

whyFeatureList.title: Time Saver
whyFeatureList.description: Stop wasting time updating embed codes every time you want to go live. Embed once and stream live every time.

moreSubTitle: With ViLive, you can auto-embed live streams from many service providers including YouTube and Twitch. Gamers, instructors, musicians, and more use VidLive to auto-embed live video streams on their websites. Check out how easy it is, start your Free Trial today!

testimonialList.testimonial1: We are a church and our pastor is popular globally. It has allowed us to livestream our services and show them on our website for people who are not on Facebook.
testimonialList.author: Kelly Ling, Heritage Presbyterian Church

testimonialList.testimonial1: Before VidLive... after starting a live stream, I had to manually add the embed code to our website every time.
testimonialList.testimonial2: This was too much work in a short time before the event began. Now I don't have to worry about it. Fantastic!
testimonialList.author: Silvio Miranda, Catholic Church of The Holy Trinity

testimonialList.testimonial1: VidLive has been an essential component to reach those in our group who choose not to be on social media. Being able to stream and push content to our website has been so valuable.
testimonialList.author: Tim Lee, Pathway Community Church

testimonialList.testimonial1: Your app has been a definite blessing. A number of members do not use Facebook and for that reason, have been unable to watch our livestream services. Now, they can! Thank you!
testimonialList.author: Joseph Campbell, South Charlotte Baptist Church & Academy

testimonialList.testimonial1: People can go to our website to watch our live or latest video without the confusion of facebook
testimonialList.author: Jeff Goin, Redeemer Lutheran Green Bay

testimonialList.testimonial1: People can go to our website to watch our live or latest video without the confusion of facebook.
testimonialList.author: Steven Antonio, Mary, Queen of the Apostles Parish - Salem MA

testimonialList.testimonial1: VidLive is fantastic. I found it after doing a search for LiveStreaming tools and software and LiveStreaming for cheap, in order to start a LiveStream for our Church.
testimonialList.author: Kris Kemp, Royal Palm Presbyterian Church

testimonialList.testimonial1: VidLive allows those who do not like Facebook or who are not confident to use it, view our streamed services. Its great, I do not have to update the website each week.
testimonialList.author: Simon Crofton, Holy Rood Church

testimonialList.testimonial1: VidLive helps us embed live-streams to our website for those not directly on Facebook.
testimonialList.testimonial2: The stream to our site is easier for us to share than sending people to our Facebook page.
testimonialList.author: Jason Hugg, Berks Weekly

testimonialList.testimonial1: I love being able to point people to our website to view our livestream broadcasts. Super helpful for non Facebook users.
testimonialList.author: Paul Amlin, The Water of Life Conference, ELCA

testimonialList.testimonial1: VidLive automated the process for our church and took away the last minute stress on Sunday Mornings!
testimonialList.author: Hope Vernon, Hope Christian Church

testimonialList.testimonial1: Using VidLive has resulted in a shift from viewers of live-streamed Sunday Mass on FB to our website
testimonialList.author: Alan J Heavens, Holy Trinity Episcopal Church

testimonialList.testimonial1: VidLive allows our members without Facebook to view our livestream worship services on our website.
testimonialList.author: Patti Grayson, Hilton Presbyterian Church

testimonialList.testimonial1: With VidLive, people were able to view the the live stream via my website without having to create a Facebook page.
testimonialList.author: Christopher Thomas, RISE HIGH RADIO

testimonialList.testimonial1: Every day we stream the daily mass via Facebook Live.
testimonialList.testimonial2: With VidLive we now have a permanent embed streaming Facebook Live to our .org website!
testimonialList.author: Gabriel Gaud Burgos, Soy Claretiano

testimonialList.testimonial1: VidLive is great! It allowed us to add an automatic Facebook live stream to our Squarespace website
testimonialList.author: Malynda Tamang, River Church of Juniata County

testimonialList.testimonial1: We needed a reasonably priced way to embed our FB live streaming during COVID. This was the perfect solution for our needs.
testimonialList.author: Isaac M Chartoff, Temple Etz Chaim

testimonialList.testimonial1: VidLive makes it easy to view our FBLIVE worship on our website for those not on Facebook.
testimonialList.author: Steven Kyle Adair, Glendale United Methodist Church - Nashville
